00025         class _BSAPI Controller : public DeepMemoryPoolObject
00026         {
00027                 // Struct for controlling smooth interpolation of an Emitter member variable.
00028                 struct MemberController
00029                 {
00030                         float time;
00031                         bstype speed;
00032                 };
00033 
00034                 // Stores an instance of an Emitter, and structures for controlling its variables.
00035                 struct EmitterInstance
00036                 {
00037                         Emitter* emitter;
00038                         bstype special[NUM_SPECIAL_MEMBERS];
00039 
00040                         MemberController controllers[NUM_SPECIAL_MEMBERS];
00041                         uint32 activeControllers;
00042                 };
00043 
00044                 // Event structure, contains a pointer to a shared CodeRecord which contains the
00045                 // bytecode for this event.
00046                 struct Event
00047                 {
00048                         String name;
00049                         int numArguments;
00050                         CodeRecord* code;
00051                 };
00052 
00053                 bool mEnabled;
00054 
00055                 ScriptMachine* mScriptMachine;
00056

00058                 float mDirX, mDirY;
00059 
00060                 // Array of Emitter instances.
00061                 EmitterInstance* mEmitters;
00062 
00063                 int mNumEmitters;
00064 
00065                 // Array of events.
00066                 Event* mEvents;
00067 
00068                 int mNumEvents;

00073                 // Script structures.

00078                 // Weak pointer to user-supplied object.
00079                 void* mUserObject;
